How to setup dev environment
---

how to deploy
---
    1. deploy to docker
    2. deploy to pypi
    3. how to use news2play package
    
### Command for init dev environment
```bash
make init
```
### Command for deploy to PyPI
```bash
make publish
```
### Comand for install news2play
```bash
pip3 install news2play
```
